game.name: Elendia Ceus
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: What lies beneath the skies? Can the truth be too much to bear? Play as Annie and her friends in this epic old-school RPG developed by Aldorlea Games, and find out!
game.shortDescriptionEn: What lies beneath the skies? Can the truth be too much to bear? Play as Annie and her friends in this epic old-school RPG developed by Aldorlea Games, and find out!

reviewHighlights.text: I frickin' hate games like this that gets you all the way to the end to not the final boss but to several final bosses in a row where you can't save a...
